channel.title: 2007/08 on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in 2007/08 on Ian Wootten

item.title: Sharing too much?
item.description: I’ve heard a couple of rumours this evening that google may be launching a facebook app that allows your friends to see your search trends over time via your facebook mini feed. There’s some discussion over on facereviews.com that anything like this exists, but for me it raises an interesting question about how much information people are willing to share within their own “social networks”. Would I be comfortable with everyone knowing what I was searching for?

item.title: Neckache
item.description: The other evening I managed to stretch my back awkwardly and I’ve been feeling the repercussions of it ever since. It’s extremely painful to move my head, arm or neck and I’m getting really frustrated by not being able to sit at the computer without being uncomfortable. Wednesday night I was flat out in bed not able to move an inch, and little more of an improvement last night. It’s making me really tired and irritable.

item.title: FOWA Roadtrip Bristol
item.description: Yesterday evening I had the pleasure of meeting up with a bunch of fellow geeks and web peeps over in Bristol as part of Ryan Carsons Future of Web Applications Roadtrip. It was a bit of a crazy evening, with me stuck in Cardiff for the best part of two hours prior to leaving. This was due to a “large fire” in Newport which was smoking out the rail line so the fire brigade shut everything down.
